attributes.action: Bring City Bonuses fully within the scope of Taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This year it is said that "bonuses" awarded to financial services sector employees total £30 bn. This could involve a loss of tax revenue to the Exchequer of around £12 bn. per annum. The vast majority of people in the UK. pay tax on every penny they earn and it is iniquitous that this specially favoured group are given such outrageous tax breaks.
